alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Leavenworth; Wyandotte (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 9:12PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Wyandotte, southwestern Leavenworth and northwestern Johnson Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 912 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over De Soto, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Olathe, Shawnee, Lenexa, Gardner, Bonner Springs, De Soto, Edwardsville, Kansas City, Linwood, Reno, Holliday and Clearview City. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 in Kansas between mile markers 215 and 218. Interstate 435 between mile markers 6 and 12. Kansas Turnpike between mile markers 206 and 224. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
